text: Arau tumi sihamtara majata allahe yi aratirna karaiche se'i anuyayi bicara nispatti karaa arau sihamtara prabrttira anusarana nakaraiba arau sihamtara bisaye satarka horaa, yate allahe tomara prati yi aratirna karaiche sihamte iyara kono bisayara paraa tomaka bicyuta karaiba noraarae. Yadi sihamte mukha ghuraa'i laya tente jani thoraa ye, allahe sihamtaka kerala sihamtara kichumana gunahara babe sasti diba bicarae arau manuhara majata bahute'i phachikba
